creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Stephen Addiss and Audrey Seo in honor of the 10th anniversary of the Lee Institute
description: white-robed figure seated on edge of a rocky outcropping over crashing waves; very faint grey halo behind head; green mount

title: White-robed Kannon
